attributes.action: Pioneer a new strategy regarding: ‘safe practice: Nurse-to-Patient ratios’.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned formally request that the British government launch a ruling which requires the Department of health (DOH) to pioneer a new strategy on: 'Safe practice: Nurse-to-Patient ratios’ which should be similar to the one passed in California (United States). Furthermore, this must then be stated in the Nursing & Midwifery code of professional conduct to ensure it’s adhered to at all times.
